name: FruitMachine
0:
”Alexa open fruit machine”
”Alexa start fruit machine”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fruit machine
des:
Experience the thrill of Las Vegas right on your Alexa device with the Fruit Machine skill! 

This skill is free to play. Say "Alexa, open fruit machine," and then when prompted, say "spin" to insert five coins and spin the machine. If you make a combination with the fruits, you will get a reward! When you run out of coins, you can't spin anymore. But you can come back the next day for a daily reward.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
